text: The Barcelona School of Informatics (; ) is one of the schools of the Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya (Technical University of Catalonia), Spain. It was created in 1976, four years after the establishment of the university. It is located in the north campus, and is the main school for computer science degrees. ==References== == External links == * Category:Education in Barcelona Category:Schools of informatics Category:Polytechnic University of Catalonia
title: Barcelona School of Informatics
